pages.text: The $(d)Energy Distributor$() allows you to evenly distribute FE among all adjacent energy storage blocks in a line.$(br2)Starting from the block in front of it, it will check each block in that direction for energy storage, and add them to its cache.
pages.title: Energy Distributor

pages.text: The Energy Distributor's energy storage is actually all of those blocks combined. Inserting into the Distributor will insert into the blocks, and the same for extracting.$(br2)The $(d)Ender Energy Distributor$() works similarly, but uses 8 $(l:items/location_filter)Location Filters$(/l) to specify the machines in the cache.
pages.title: Ender Energy Distributor
